\usepackage{amssymb,amsfonts,mathrsfs}

%Footnotes

\usepackage{perpage}

\usepackage[colorlinks=true,linkcolor=blue,citecolor=blue,backref=page]{hyperref}
\usepackage{math60,mlthm}
\usepackage{local}

% The following works better in one sided mode
% showkeys ignores 'oneside' and puts label on the left
% on even numbered pages, hence they become invisible
\usepackage{showlabels}
\renewcommand{\showlabelfont}{\scriptsize\ttfamily}

% \renewcommand{\rmdefault}{pplj}
\usepackage{euler}

\setcounter{tocdepth}{1}
